availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky farmer and infantry private. Kentucky native. Private of Company A, 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment, U.S.A. from 1861 to 1864.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 311. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Spruce Grove, p. 112. Organization Index to Pension Files of Veterans who served between 1861 and 1900, Civil War Pensions Index, roll no. 159. U.S., Civil War Soldier Records and Profiles, 1861-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky.
